name: Boya
headline: Corporate Expense cards and Spend management for businesses in Africa
description:
Boya Makes it easy for businesses in Africa to issue corporate expense cards instantly and great software to control and track spending. For example, if you run a pharmaceutical company, you can use Boya to instantly issue Visa cards to sales and marketing teams and get real-time visibility and control over their spending.

50M+ businesses in Africa have no easy way to streamline and track their employee spending in real-time. So we are building a corporate card and a spend management platform that enables businesses to streamline spend workflows and provide real-time reporting. We are building the first corporate card that supports mobile money, banks and card schemes payment workflows

founders.name: Alphas Sinja, Founder
founders.description: Alphas Sinja is the co-founder and CEO of Boya. Alphas has 8+ yrs experience in Finance, strategy, and banking.

### Corporate mobile money

## Control card spend at scale
You’re in control. Set spending limits, track in real-time, and block merchant categories. Limit staff spending with inbuilt policies to ensure everyone is on budget and confirm transactions via SMS. The Cards are accepted globally at ZERO fees, from online marketing spend, transportation, subscriptions, supermarkets, hotels, and restaurants.
[Corporate cards](https://boyahq.com/</corporate-cards>)

## Issue expense mobile money wallets
Stop sending mobile money to employees' personal phone numbers. Enable your teams to make mobile money payments directly from corporate wallets with in-built control and policies. Limit staff spending by only using the amount allocated to their individual or team wallets.
[Business accounts](https://boyahq.com/</business-accounts>)
## Automate expenses.‍Save time
Automatically collect receipts compliant with tax laws and easily categorize with the right cost labels. Access every transaction instantly and know exactly who’s spending on what. Track your top-line spending or drill into any transaction in real-time on a single dashboard from any device.
[Expense management](https://boyahq.com/</expense-management>)
![save time](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e0b2fd3c7dc8ff59476b54/65e81ecd3add4168961c7c21_save%20time.webp)
![streamline](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e0b2fd3c7dc8ff59476b54/65e81ecdbf539bf8b15926b7_streamline.webp)
## Streamline vendor payments
Automatically collect vendor invoices and get them ready for payment with your custom invoice approval workflows to put budget owners in control of every transaction. With bank transfers, mobile money, and multiple currency support, you can make payments globally with a single tool.
[Bill payments](https://boyahq.com/</bill-payments>)
## Accurately close books‍5x faster
Automatically reconcile transactions and receipts in one place. Receipts are captured in real-time on the mobile app, so you don’t spend days charging your teams for paper receipts. Boya will code and report the expense – no manual data entry is needed! Zero paperwork.
[Expense management](https://boyahq.com/</expense-management>)

## Sync with your accounting or ERP
Seamlessly create rules that map your expense accounts with Boya and use our pre-built direct integrations or custom exports to effortlessly integrate Boya transactions, invoices, and receipts into your existing accounting software or ERP like Quickbooks, Xero, SAP, Microsoft Dynamics, and NetSuite.
[Expense management](https://boyahq.com/</expense-management>)

**Mission**: Boya aims to simplify corporate expense management and card issuance for businesses across Africa.

### Problem and Solution

Boya addresses a significant gap in the domain of corporate spending management in Africa, where over **50 million businesses** struggle to track and control employee expenses in real time. The solution comes in the form of **corporate expense cards and a robust spend management platform**. ### Product Offering

Boya delivers a comprehensive suite of tools designed to improve visibility and control of corporate spending. Here’s what they provide:

- **Corporate Cards**: Issue unlimited virtual and physical cards with integrated spending policies.
  
- **Mobile Money Integration**: The first corporate card that supports mobile money, allowing for direct payment from company wallets rather than employees' personal accounts.
  
- **Expense Management Tools**: Set real-time spending policies, automate reports, and ensure compliance.
  
- **Bill Payments**: Streamline accounts payable processes while keeping all stakeholders on the same page.

- **Business Accounts**: Manage domestic and foreign currency accounts seamlessly within Boya’s ecosystem.

### How It Works

The platform enables finance teams to set spending limits, track transactions in real-time, and enforce controls to prevent overspending. Boya’s tools automate tasks that traditionally consumed hours—like receipt reconciliation—allowing organizations to close their books five times faster. 

### Market Position

Boya is tagged as a player in fintech, payments, b2b services, and neobanking. The startup is not just about issuing cards; it’s about empowering businesses to manage their finances more effectively, especially in a continent where traditional banking can be cumbersome.

### Trust and Credibility

Boya has quickly gained traction with reputable clients across various industries, showcasing its reliability in managing corporate finances. Customer testimonials highlight how the platform enhances real-time financial oversight, facilitates easy tracking of funds, and aids in operational continuity.

### Conclusion

In a rapidly evolving financial landscape, Boya stands out with its innovative approach to corporate expense management catered specifically to the African market. By blending technology with user-friendly interfaces and robust support, Boya isn’t merely providing a product; they’re redefining how African businesses interact with their spending habits. If you’re looking for a smarter way to manage your corporate expenses, Boya might just be the solution you need. 

For more information, visit [Boya’s website](https://boyahq.com).
